about_the_game:
You spent years building the perfect Bara card collection, filled with the rarest and hottest characters… and now they're gone! Someone hid your precious deck around the house, and only you can find it.

  • Explore 3D environments and search every corner—your cards could be where you least expect.

  • Dig through drawers, look behind furniture, and check even the most… intimate spots. Don’t let a single card slip away!

  • Unlock sensual illustrations and reclaim every piece of this must-have collection.

Ready for a hidden object game packed with muscles, mystery, and temptation? Only true collectors can recover the full deck!

  • 100 Sensual cards

  • 7 Interactive rooms

  • Play with one hand

  • Controller support

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains erotic illustrations and suggestive images (including explicit nudity). Players should be aware that the game includes fantasy elements and adult themes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux/X11
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core or Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Where's my Bara Deck?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Your Bara cards have vanished! Someone hid your deck around the house, and only you can find it. Explore 3D environments, search every corner, and unlock sensual art as you complete your collection. Ready for this spicy, surprise-filled hunt?
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
